metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3094 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: PlainSaslServer.java in Apache Qpid Java before 6.0.3, when the broker isconfigured to allow plaintext passwords, allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (broker termination) via a crafted authenticationattempt, which triggers an uncaught exception.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
